15532.content:
You slowly awoke, lying on a hard surface with a bright light shining in your eyes. You sat up, and took in your surroundings. You were in a huge room, lying on a massive, bumpy plastic floor that curved up slightly to your left and right. There were giant structures all around you, after a moment which you recognized as hundred foot tall desks and chairs. You were in your first class of the day, history! But everything was so big... Your head was swimming as you realized everything wasn't big, you were just tiny. You stumbled to your feet and realized you were no more than an inch tall, and you had come to atop one of the plastic molded chairs of the classroom. You looked around and didn't see a single other person in sight. You were standing in a molded plastic chair, shaped to be more comfortable for people to sit in, near the far back of the class. You thought about jumping off the edge to look for help.

Before you could think too much, a tremendous ringing filled the room. The first period bell marked the start of class, and before you knew it, students were streaming in the door at the front of class. You panicked, thinking a girl was about to come back and sit in the chair you were on, before you looked around the room and realized that you had luckily woken up in your usual seat, way in the back of class. You calmed down; there was assigned seating, so nobody would come back here and take your spot. Plus, even if they wanted to, they'd probably see you in the chair first, and then you could get help!

You began to feel much more confident about finding a way out of this situation, before you spotted Laura, a classmate, heading your way. She was wearing a tight tank top, and a pair of way-too-tight short shorts. You had never gotten along with her very well; she was very cold, and always pretty rude to you. She always complained about you getting a seat in the back of the class and not her, where the teacher didn't call on people as much. Even though it wasn't your choice, Laura was always mean to you for getting a spot in the back of the class over her. She normally sat two desks ahead of you, but today she didn't stop there. You were puzzled when she passed by her desk, and kept walking towards you. You had to crane your neck up to see her face, especially past her large breasts, as Laura stopped next to your desk, setting her notepad down. Laura's thighs towered above you as she turned to face her ass towards the chair, and began to slide into the desk. You were scared and angry that today of all days Laura would try to steal your seat, so you shouted up to her as loud as possible, "LAURA WAIT! DON'T SIT, I'M DOWN HERE!"

Despite the loud conversations filling the classroom, you saw Laura pause. Her enormous ass hung above you, ready to drop at any moment, each massive cheek completely uncovered by the thin piece of fabric riding up her ass crack. Laura curiously leaned to one side and looked down past her hips, scanning for the source of that tiny voice. Laura spotted you, but her face barely registered any surprise as she just studied your presence unemotionally. You sighed with relief, now that Laura's enormous ass was no longer descending upon you, "Oh my god, thank you! I thought you were about to sit on me!" you cried, trying to steady your nerves. Laura smirked devilishly and said, "Oh? Who says I'm not?"

You felt your heart drop again. "W-what do you mean? This is MY seat!" you stammered, trying to convince the giant brat to leave.

Laura shrugged nonchalantly and replied, "Well, today it isn't." Without another word, Laura dropped her ass more roughly than necessary into the chair. Before you even had a chance to yell in surprise, you had been flattened under Laura's tremendous and bare right ass cheek. As Laura's thick ass continued to bounce into place, she twisted left and right, getting comfortable as you were smeared across the chair by her buttocks. You thought you heard Laura giggle in satisfaction, but it was hard to be sure. Laura smiled to herself, happy that she finally had the seat she always wanted, as you desperately pushed against her jiggling ass in an attempt to prevent her flesh from enveloping your face. Before Laura could enjoy her victory any more, the teacher walked into the room and began roll call. Laura promptly forgot about the little man trapped against her ass cheek, and opened up her notebook to doodle.

Does anybody notice that Laura is in your seat during roll call?
